ticket.title: layout does not show
ticket.original-body:
ROR 3.0.3 when I change view path with prepend_view_path ::Rails.root.to_s+"/app/applications/simple-application/views" in my ActionController, template is rendered without any layout. I tried copy layouts directory to a given folder. I also tried to set layout to "application". But no success.
There is also another problem:
Layout definition in controller cannot take file name with absolute file path or it does not work at all(it renders without layout): class ApplicationTemplate < ApplicationController layout :layout => "/home/marko/rubyRails/wmq/app/applications/simple_application/views/layouts/application.html" ....
But layout in render method can take file name with absolute path.
